name: Shaping Colors
description:
Ready to relax? This is a game about... well, it's best not to tell the ending and let you experience it for yourself. ;)

Use a few machines to mix and match four starting colors into others during four short, relaxing levels. This was a game made for the Godot Wild Jam #53.

Controls

Mouse only

— Left Click to select and place

— Right Click to 'erase'

Options   — PIPE: To connect an output to an input (1 IN, 1 OUT)

 — MIXER: Blends two colors into one (2 IN, 1 OUT)

 — SPLITTER: Splits a color into 3 outputs (1 IN, 3 OUT)
